subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade is considering season-ending surgery to repair his dislocated left shoulder, which would be the biggest loss yet for the Miami Heat during its rocky reign as the N.B.A. champion.
snippet: Dwyane Wade is considering season-ending surgery to repair his dislocated left shoulder, which would be the biggest loss yet for the Miami Heat during its rocky reign as the N.B.A. champion.
